modName: Asrai Male Redguard No mods needed
summary:
This is my Redguard Asrai, im extremely happy with him and i hope you\'ll like him too. 

So.. no mods used at all, though you can use mods to enhance his appearence but i wouldn\'t recommend it.
descriptionHtml:
This is my Redguard Asrai, im extremely happy with him and i hope you\'ll like him too. 

So.. no mods used at all, though you can use mods to enhance his appearence but i wouldn\'t recommend it.

And you can use this however you like but it would be nice if you could send me pictures of him incase you change is face in any way! 

Extract file and move to C:\\Users\\-USERNAME-\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves

You will start inside the keep as level 1
author: Shiring
